array.task: Hug someone in need
array.tip: Make sure you know the person first ;)

array.task: Buy the person behind you in line a coffee
array.tip: Buy yourself one too!

array.task: Call someone you haven't spoken to in a while
array.tip: Call back in an hour if they don't pick up the first time

array.task: Compliment a stranger
array.tip: Is it their smile? Their top? Their aura?

array.task: Text your best friend how much they mean to you
array.tip: Add a heart emoji if you're really feeling it

array.task: Spend 10 minutes meditating today
array.tip: Look for an app or YouTube video if you need guidance

array.task: Hold a door open for someone today
array.tip: Bonus points if you smile :)

array.task: Tell a stranger to have a great day
array.tip: In line at the grocery store? Sitting next to someone on a bus?

array.task: Leave a large tip
Leave a large tip accompanied by a nice note or conversation
array.tip: Make your server feel appreciated

array.task: Offer to do an errand for a friend in need
array.tip: Basically be Cinderella for an hour or two

array.task: Make a donation in honour of someone important to you
array.tip: $5-10 is enough :)

array.task: Help a stranger carry something
array.tip: A grocery bag? A heavy box?

array.task: Give up your seat on the bus
array.tip: Look for someone who might need it

array.task: Bake for a friend in need
array.tip: Chocolate chip cookies sound good!

array.task: Prepare a homemade meal for someone important to you
array.tip: Homemade pasta sauce isn't too hard

array.task: Buy a homeless person a hot meal
array.tip: Ask them what they would like from a nearby shop

array.task: Go for coffee with a friend
array.tip: Bonus if you pay for their coffee too!

array.task: Call a relative you haven't spoken to in a while
array.tip: Ask about their day and update them on any exciting news in your life

array.task: Spend some time reading a book
array.tip: Reading anything on a screen doesn't count ;)

array.task: Ask someone how their day is going
array.tip: Short and sweet

array.task: Deliver lunch to a friend at work
array.tip: It doesn't have to be homemade

array.task: Sign a petition for a cause you're passionate about
array.tip: Check Facebook or Change.org for ideas

array.task: Sign up to volunteer a shift at a local non-profit
array.tip: Options include a food bank, animal shelter or children's centre

array.task: Drop off a bag of non-perishables to your local food bank
array.tip: Toiletries are often needed as well

array.task: Raid your closet for clothes to donate to a shelter
array.tip: Wash them first please!

array.task: Take a nap today
array.tip: Get your beauty rest

array.task: Eat a healthy dinner
array.tip: Salads can be yummy

array.task: Carpool or bus instead of driving
array.tip: We love our planet

array.task: Use a reusable product today
array.tip: Mugs, water bottles, and bags are easy alternatives

array.task: Say no to a single-use item today
array.tip: Takeout cutlery? Straw? Plastic cup?
